comment.body:
안녕하세요. 티맵모빌리티 장창훈 입니다. 
- I'm Elijah, working for T-Map Mobility.
- elijah@tmapmobility.com

(사유) 
- 하기와 같이 cdn-ads.tmap.co.kr^ 가 Blocking 되어 있어서, 
티맵에서의 광고 서비스가 정상적으로 작동하지 않는 케이스가 발견 되고 있습니다. 
다시 해제 요청 부탁 드립니다.

(해제 요청)
- ||cdn-ads.tmap.co.kr^

(비고) 
- [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters) 에 근거하여 연락 드립니다.
- 해제 요청에 따른 별도의 절차가 필요하다면 관련된 절차도 말씀 해 주세요.

comment.body:
@peace2000 Does the following work?

1. Remove the rule: `&browser=MozillaFirefox$xmlhttprequest,removeparam=/^browser/,domain=mtv.fi`
2. Add:
```
mtv.fi##+js(m3u-prune, /vod.streaming.a2d.tv\/ys/, yospace.com)
mtv.fi##+js(xml-prune, xpath(//*[name()="yospace:AdBreak"]), , /yospace.com\/csm\/access/)
```

comment.body:
Hi, so what do you suggest then in order to be able to access certain web domains like **ad.doubleclick.net**?  Any Google ad that uses this site/service is blocked, and thus prevents being able to access the link.  I don't want to remove AdGuard DNS servers just to be able to occasionally load this one domain.  I'm not sure why you'd want to block it though, considering that so many Google ads rely on this to load their product links.

Ok, I assume it must be a 3rd party AG filter then that is blocking https://www.quintadelarosa.com/?  It loads fine if I disable AdGuard.

Thanks
